snippet: Fans and players alike had positive reactions to the Mets’ decision to bring in the outfield fences, which was perhaps their most consequential move of the off-season.
abstract: New York Mets fans and players alike have positive reactions to the team's decision to bring in outfield fences at Citi Field.
lead_paragraph: Fans and players alike had positive reactions to the Mets’ decision to bring in the outfield fences, which was perhaps their most consequential move of the off-season.

headline.seo: Glimpses of Optimism Atop the New Fence in Left
headline.main: Glimpses of Optimism Atop the New Fence in Left
